stranger_masked.speaker: Narrator
stranger_masked.text: A figure enters the cafe, cloaked in fine fabrics. Most striking is the ornate half-mask covering the upper portion of their face, decorated with silver filigree.

noble_intro.speaker: The Masked Noble
noble_intro.text: *They survey the room with practiced poise* So this is the Dragon Haven I've heard whispered about in certain... circles. Charming. Delightfully provincial.

player_greet_noble.speaker: Narrator
player_greet_noble.text: How do you greet this unusual visitor?

choices.text: Welcome. We don't often see such refined guests here.
That's quite the mask. Running from something?

noble_flattered.speaker: The Masked Noble
noble_flattered.text: *A slight incline of the head* Your reputation for hospitality precedes you. I confess, I grew weary of establishments where everyone knows my... where everyone recognizes me.

noble_defensive.speaker: The Masked Noble
noble_defensive.text: *They stiffen almost imperceptibly* Running? How... direct. Let's say I'm seeking a place where I can simply... be. Without expectation. Is that so unusual?

noble_seated.speaker: Narrator
noble_seated.text: The noble selects a corner table with a view of both the door and the kitchen. A strategic position. Their posture speaks of years of etiquette training.

noble_notices_dragon.speaker: The Masked Noble
noble_notices_dragon.text: *Their composure falters slightly at seeing your dragon* Remarkable. I've only seen dragons in ancient tapestries. To think they still exist... *They seem genuinely moved*

noble_end.speaker: The Masked Noble
noble_end.text: I believe I shall make this establishment my... retreat. A place apart from the world's demands. If you'll have me, of course. *There's a hint of vulnerability beneath the formal words*
